body:
Comment 3: 
It's a problem with OS X's bundled vi, and I couldn't reproduce if I use vim compiled
myself
as vi.

I found this post about the behavior,
http://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/14497/why-would-vim-return-non-zero-exit-code-if-i-exit-immediately-after-opening

so the workaround is probably to put these 4 lines in .vimrc:
filetype on " workaround
filetype plugin indent on " workaround
filetype off
filetype plugin indent off

@jan.willem.ps, could you please try to see if the above workaround fixes the
problem for you?
